segments.text: It seems to me that you are on very good terms with him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We actually met at a dance party . He fell for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He must be all over you the first time he saw you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He said that I put all other girls in the shade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That means he was head over heels in love with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I think he can't hold a candle to you . I don't think he has ever popped the question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , he is the sort of man who likes to hide his candle under a bushel .
segments.speaker: S2
